thoughts: Misses patrolling with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates
Feels the days start to blur
Cleans a wound after an argument turned into bloodshed
Ends up trying to eat bark after days of scenting no prey
Is sparring with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws unsheathed
Fell into the mud and is feeling extra goopy
Is hissing at other Dark Forest cats
Refuses to take orders from anycat
Believes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can get even stronger
Curses c_n and StarClan itself for sending {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Dark Forest
Wants to find a living cat to take as {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} trainee
Fights several other cats at once
Delivers a killing blow
Rolls in the mud to get the scent of blood off {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt
Wants power in whatever way {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can get it
Stares blankly at the black sky
Flexes {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws in and out, in and out
Launches a surprise attack on another Dark Forest cat
Is spitting at any cat that dares look at {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Wants to dig {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws into another cat's pelt
Is daydreaming of bloodshed
Is tormenting weaker souls
Doesn't want to train today
Trains all day
